strapiPost.title: Acclaimed Cellist & Conductor Amit Peled To Visit Northwest Arkansas
strapiPost.content:
Israeli cellist Amit Peled will perform at the Arkansas Arts Academy in Rogers on Monday, Mar 27, at 7:30p and instruct a masterclass to area cello students during his stay in partnership with OpenStringZ NWA on Mar 28.

  • Accolades: Named a Top 30 Influencer of 2015 by Musical America, Peled has performed in many of the world's most prestigious venues, including Carnegie Hall in New York, the J.F.K Center for the Performing Arts in Washington D.C., and The Salle Gaveau in Paris.
  • Emerging artists: OpenStringZ NWA provides unique opportunities to classical music students, such as classes and camps, and curates events for classical music lovers in our area.

Tickets are $35 and can be purchased HERE.
